name: Bahini
description:
Bahini , a first person shooter game , is still in active development. Feel free to contact us, if you face any kinds of technical error :)

Minimum Requirements :

Processor : Intel dual core/AMD Athlon 200GE AM4 or later

RAM : 4 GB (DDR3)

Disk Space : 4 GB

GPU : 2 GB GT/GTX/RTX/AMD radon series graphics card (not necessary but recommended for better performance)

Operating System : Windows 10/8/7 (64 bit)

Recommended Requirements :

Processor : Intel i3 10th generation/AMD Ryzen 3 3300X  or later

RAM : 8GB (DDR4)

Disk Space : 4GB

GPU : NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750 ti or AMD R7 260x or later

Operating System : Windows 10/8/7 64 bit (64 bit)

This an offline game but it needs internet connection to work, otherwise you might face some fatal errors.

Note that this game is in beta phase , so there might be some glitches , bugs , assets etc. So, please let us know if there is any kind of technical difficulties.
